Quest.Name: The Time for Mercy has Passed

CustomBehavior.Text:
For Horde, this starts in Moonglade or Hyjal

If you experience issues, I need to know about them. Please report them to my thread

Press continue

-Kick
You must have the flying key or Lifetime to use this profile!
Compiling The Circle of Cinders Quests
If you see this message, then you probably died and need to drop Through the Dream and press start again
